input: Consider the following statements about the attorney general of India: P. He is appointed by the President of India Q. He must have the same qualifications as required for a judge of the Supreme Court R. He must be a member of either House of Parliament S. He can be removed by impeachment by Parliament Which of these statements are correct?
explanation: Article 76 of the constitution says about Attorney General of India. The president shall appoint a person who is qualified the same as a judge of the Supreme Court.
